about.goalText: To create an innovative platform that analyzes your health data and provides useful insights. Our assistant helps you understand your health status based on average heart rate, blood pressure, current medications, medical records, date of birth, weight, height, and other data, and can even predict potential health issues.

howItWorksSteps: Visit the Sanovise App page.
Enter your health data, such as heart rate, blood pressure, height, weight, etc.
The application analyzes the data using artificial intelligence.
Receive feedback on your health status and learn about potential health risks.
about.whyChooseUsText: Our health advisory system is built on modern technology, simplifying the management and analysis of your health data. With an intuitive user interface and artificial intelligence integration, you can get a comprehensive view of your health. It's an ideal choice for anyone who wants to actively monitor and improve their health.
about.thankYou: Thank you for choosing us and giving us the opportunity to support you on your journey toward a healthier lifestyle!
